Sentencas: Catalytic partial oxidation (CPOx) of n-butane in O-2/Ar mixtures at ratios of 1/3.76 has been investigated over Rh catalysis impregnated in gamma-Al2O3 washcoat supports coated on alpha-Al2O3 ceramic foam monoliths.
Titulo: Catalytic partial oxidation of n-butane over Rh catalysts for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The impact of heat loss on Rh-based CPOx reactor performance for small-scale SOFC application is tested here by varying reactor lengths, insulation, and flow conditions.
Titulo: Catalytic partial oxidation of n-butane over Rh catalysts for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Results for a C/O ratio = 1.0 and T-in = 300 degrees C indicate the n-butane conversion and H-2 and CO selectivity depend strongly upon reactor temperature and thus heat lost through the external reactor walls.
Titulo: Catalytic partial oxidation of n-butane over Rh catalysts for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Because heat loss does not scale with flow rate, higher flow rates for catalyst contact times approaching 15 ms increase fuel conversion and syngas selectivity.
Titulo: Catalytic partial oxidation of n-butane over Rh catalysts for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Furthermore, shortening catalyst length (from 10 to 5 mm) also reduces heat loss and increases fuel conversion and H-2 selectivity.
Titulo: Catalytic partial oxidation of n-butane over Rh catalysts for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: CO selectivity, however, drops with the shorter length.
Titulo: Catalytic partial oxidation of n-butane over Rh catalysts for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: These results suggest that for the conditions tested, butane conversion and H-2 production occur rapidly within the first couple ofmmin the reactor, whereas CO production occurs more broadly throughout the reactor length.
Titulo: Catalytic partial oxidation of n-butane over Rh catalysts for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: This study provides valuable insight into the conditions needed for good CPOx performance for fuel processing in small-scale SOFC applications.
Titulo: Catalytic partial oxidation of n-butane over Rh catalysts for solid oxide fuel cell applications
